column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday April 3 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75 near Exit 104 in Fayette Co:
column4: The roadway is scheduled to be closed in both directions at approximately 1:30 p.m. for power line repair operations.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75 near Exit 104 in Fayette Co:
column4: Police are expected to perform rolling roadblocks in both directions. EXPECTED DURATION 45-60 MINUTES.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75 near Exit 104 in Fayette Co:
column4: Southbound traffic may detour at Exit 108 (Man O War).

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75 near Exit 104 in Fayette Co:
column4: Northbound traffic may detour at Exit 99 (just north of the Clays Ferry Bridge).
